note: [Non-melanoma skin cancers](#dod:non-melanoma-skin-cancer) are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
title: Share of new cancers caused by all known infectious agents
subtitle: Estimated share of new [cancer](#dod:cancer) cases attributed to all known [cancer-causing pathogens](#dod:cancer-causing-pathogens). Estimates come with uncertainties, especially for countries that lack cancer registries or have limited pathogen testing.
